name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー本島

keyEvents.title: Gomorrah Blinded But Persists
keyEvents.description: Gomorrah is blinded by the Just Eleven Jurymen but continues charging forward.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the intense battles occurring across the Main Island.

keyEvents.title: Oimo and Kashii Defect
keyEvents.description: The giant gatekeepers officially switch sides to help the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the chaos and changing allegiances during the invasion.

keyEvents.title: Over 2000 Casualties Reported
keyEvents.description: The devastating toll of the invasion across the Main Island is revealed.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the unprecedented scale of destruction at Enies Lobby.

name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー裁判所前広場

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Reach the Courthouse Plaza
keyEvents.description: After fighting through the Main Island, the Straw Hats successfully arrive at the Courthouse Plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the successful completion of the first phase of the rescue operation.

name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー裁判所屋上

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Blueno Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: Luffy confronts CP9 agent Blueno on the courthouse rooftop.
keyEvents.significance: Sets the stage for one of the most iconic moments in the series.

keyEvents.title: Gear 2 Revealed
keyEvents.description: Luffy unveils his new technique, Gear 2, atop the courthouse.
keyEvents.significance: The rooftop becomes the location of one of One Piece's most memorable power-up reveals.
